title: Arduino Repository
description: This repository contains Arduino scripts. I have started learning to code with Arduino using a starter kit that includes a motherboard and components for practice.

title: Python repository
description: This repository includes some basic Python scripts and a small project I created with Django. I learned a bit of Python by searching through internet web pages.

title: JS Challenges
description: After completing the bootcamp, I noticed that I needed to improve my programming logic, so I started doing challenges on edabit.com to enhance my skills. At the same time, I also bought a mathematics book and worked on exercises related to parable, polynomials, arrays, probability, ...

title: TypeScript
description: This repository contains examples of how to use TypeScript. I created it for the purpose of learning how to use TypeScript.

title: ThreeJS
description: In this repository, I started using Three.js to understand it and be able to add objects to web pages in the future.

title: Forapi
description: Forapi is an application that serves to search for furniture from near stores. The project is built using the MERN stack and also includes a React Native app, as well as a small scraping project using Puppeteer..

title: Portfolio
description: This is my portfolio, and I created it using Vue. It contains information about my repositories, a link to my LinkedIn profile, and my phone number for contacting me.
